plot: A homeless teenage girl attempts suicide and, assisted by a magic mirror and a fairy princess, journeys to 'The Land of Lost Souls' where she meets a fallen angel.
title: Tasha's Dream
plot_es: A homeless teenage girl attempts suicide and, assisted by a magic mirror and a fairy princess, journeys to 'The Land of Lost Souls' where she meets a fallen angel.
plot_en: A homeless teenage girl attempts suicide and, assisted by a magic mirror and a fairy princess, journeys to 'The Land of Lost Souls' where she meets a fallen angel.
